Room.Name: Lost in the Respitial Sea
Room.ShortDescription: You are floating on the waves of a vast sea, hopelessly lost.
Room.LongDescription: Each wave pretty much looks like another, making it difficult to determine your position. It's too bad the sky is os overcast, or you might be able to determine where you are by the stars in the night sky. That is, if you hadn't mudded so much and flunked celestial navigation. Oh well, keep swimming. You're bound to find something sometime.
